game.description: The legendary sword of Zephyr has been stolen from the kingdom of Valeria. The king has sent out a request to all brave adventurers to retrieve the sword and bring it back to the kingdom.
game.objective: Find and retrieve the legendary sword of Zephyr.
game.reward: 10,000 gold coins and a title of honor

tasks.description: Investigate the last known location of the sword
tasks.objective: Search for any clues or evidence that may lead to the sword's whereabouts

tasks.description: Visit the Oracle at the Enchanted Forest
tasks.objective: Seek the Oracle's guidance on the location of the stolen sword

tasks.description: Defeat the guardian of the Crimson Cave
tasks.objective: Retrieve the key to unlock the hidden path to the sword's resting place

tasks.description: Face the challenges of the Misty Mountains
tasks.objective: Navigate through treacherous terrains and overcome obstacles to reach the sword

game.title: The Quest for the Sword of Zephyr
